howWorks.question: How does Stoocker work?
howWorks.answer: Stoocker is a cloud-based inventory management system. Add your products, track stock movements, generate instant reports, and manage all operations from a single platform. Setup takes just a few minutes.

devices.question: What devices can I use?
devices.answer: You can access Stoocker from any computer, tablet, or mobile device. Our responsive design works seamlessly on all platforms. Mobile apps are available for iOS and Android.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, your data is protected with enterprise-level security. We use SSL encryption, regular backups, two-factor authentication, and comply with industry security standards. Data is backed up daily and stored encrypted.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes, you have a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required, and there's no automatic charge when the trial ends.

integrations.question: Can it integrate with other systems?
integrations.answer: Yes, Stoocker integrates with popular e-commerce platforms, accounting software, and ERP systems. Our REST API allows for custom integrations with your existing systems.

support.question: How does support work?
support.answer: Pro and Enterprise plans include 24/7 priority support via email, phone, and live chat. Starter plan includes email support. We also provide detailed documentation and video tutorials.
